resources.string:
Press the Buttons to move the ball around.

Upon pressing the speak button, please wait till you see a pop up.

Actions that are valid are:

1. make it a "square".

2. make it a "circle".

3. make it "grow".

4. make it "shrink".

Thanks a lot. PLEASE NOTE: INTERNET CONNECTION MUST 
BE PROVIDED FOR THE SPEECH RECOGNITION TO WORK


 Made By: Vignesh Ramakrishnan
 GitHub: www.github.com/hacker404 Feedback:vicky3008@gmail.com
